text: Dominic J. Squatrito (April 9, 1938 â€“ January 20, 2021) was an American politician and lawyer. He was nominated to the United States District Court for the District of Connecticut in 1994 by President Bill Clinton. Squatrito was born in Hartford, Connecticut. Squatrito died on January 20, 2021 in Manchester, Connecticut at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Hartford, Connecticut Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Dominic J. Squatrito
